text: The men's 4x400 metres relay event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 1 and 2 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Daniel McFarlane Daniel Batman Scott Thom Casey Vincent ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Tony Berrian Kevin Baker Brian Swarn Andrew Pierce ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Sanjay Ayre Leroy Colquhoun Omar Henry Dwayne Miller ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 2 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 4 × 400 metres relay
